chen bo chos 'phags de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so// thos nas kyang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i'adu shes bskyed nas/ deting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta

ste chos thams cad kyi ngo de nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyade ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo 'di shes pa las nges
par 'byung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes khya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos
thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad mun pa dang bral bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad ma shes pa sel bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/
ka chos thams cad rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad mi ngamigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos

thamasacad bdag gi dngos po mkhaslab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ skya na rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i dang pa'i dzinadang/ me 'a nga gi dkyil 'khor snangab sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/
sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdul yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems can thams cad mngon par dga' bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems

can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sgra dang tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs mngon par sgang pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang/ rang bzhinagyis tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang la dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tinge pa'i dzin

dang ming dang nges pa ritshig dang tshig dang yig 'bra zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad yul dang bral ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting ngo
'dzin dang/ gzugs kyi rdul sel bzhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang///
raldog ba'i mig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dbugs

wA 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdul dang rnam

bar bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nem nur gcod pazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/

snying bo thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad lasa mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mngon par shes pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad la nges nga ra'abigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i phyagargya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad

cad kyi 'byor pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ lta bar gyur ba'i thobs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes pya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ le lo thams cad dngabral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rib 'dra bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mi
'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang/ 'od gzer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhal du med grangs med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la she
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i di nyid rab tuson pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'dis nyes rigs kyi bu red/

kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du yongs su btsal to/ yongs su tshol ban yang gang 'dir khyod kyis thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di lta
bu nyid dag thob ste/ ting 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa la rtogs pa khong du chud par gyur te/ phyi mi ldog pa'i sas rgyas kyi chos la gnas
bar gyur to/ nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ gang byang chub tu spyad par bya ba
shu'am gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha
yol tu phyin pa de yin te/ chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di'adra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen
! po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang 'od 'dom gang ba dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang/ sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bla na med pa
dang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha la tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la re zhig de bzhin/
gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad gzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na nyanathos dang rangasangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tudon
du gnyer ba dang 'dod pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don duganyer ba dang 'dod pa 'a ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub red par dka' ba ma yin no// rigs/
kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyad bar bya'o// yangs par bya'o// rab cu dungabar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ozhes kyang gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'
soms dbachen bo rtag tu ngusa'adi skad ces bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags zhes gsol to// de dag gis de la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyed yun ring po nas byang chub mas
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas
pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bslabasaso// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod kyi dge ba'i ngeshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/ byas pa shes pa dang byas pa tshor bsades bsgo ba dang des byas
pa bzhin du zung zhig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po chos 'phags 'a bskal pa gcig gam bskal pa gnyis sam bskal pa gsum mam bskal pa//
[r]nga@#// brgyabam/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thodabazhin du thogs shing bde ba'i yo byadathams cad kyis rim gror byas te//

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyikhams na gzugs dang sgradang dridang ro dang reg pa ci snyed yod pa de dgathams cad phul yang 'gos kyi bu khyod kyis gos kyi bu de'i byas pa de nyid la'an len pa ma

wA yanino// de tsa'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyedakyis 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams red par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas thos shing shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to zhes bkalastsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung nasam snang bar gyur to/
rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tugadung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzung
thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal banams la lhagapa bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag par yongs su 'dzin pa// yun ring po nas des
bdag gidzin byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems dang 'ase nas dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste 'bar phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon// de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhudaces don 'di nyide dri'i sAmamo// de nas byang chub sems dapa'i sams dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu byang chub sams dba'asams dpa' chen po chos 'phags
la dga' ba dang dad pa dang ri mo dang gus par bya ba 'bar bzhag ste/ zhe bar bzhag nasa'adisnyam du sems so bdag gis rtsi lta bu'i bkur stir bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po
chos 'aphags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdagan dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur stir byaba'i ges sam rin po che'am/ gsar
ramanor bu 'am mu tig gam bi zlum+ma'am dung ngam man shelalam bya re 'am dngul lam ma rtog gam bdug pa 'am dri'am phreng ba 'am khyug pa 'am phyom 'amaches gos sam/ gdugs sam rgyal mtshan/
nam= dril bu 'am ba dan de lta bu yang bdag la ci yang medan/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'aphags kyi drung du song na ni bdag gis mi rigs nga byas
par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am rangs pa yang mi skye'o snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang bla ma la gus pa yid
[@]/ @#// la byed pa dag dang ldan ngs song nas mthar gyis grong khyer gzhan zhig tu phyin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu grong bar gyi
srang ga la ba der songs de'i grong bar gyi dbus su phyin nas de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongasal/ de'irin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur
ster bya'od/ yun ring ponas bdag gi lus stong zhig cung zad de/ 'gags par btsongs so// 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i rgyu dang/ 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang sems can
dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'dilta bu 'achos kyi phyir ram 'dalta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur stir bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dang 'chen po rtag tu ngus grong bar gyi tshong dus kyi dbus su 'dugs mi su 'dod ma su 'dod mi su nyo bar 'dod ces sgra sgrags shing skad kyis nges so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis
'di snyam du byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tungu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdaganyid btsongasanas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir
byed cing/ ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyir rol tu phyin pa la sbyang na myur du branamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyuran+te
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ des thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis ma thub par 'gyur yon
tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar sas/
rgyas nas de dang gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di'i bar chad bya'o snyam du bsams so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas dram ze dang khyim
bdag de dag gis/ byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tungus mi su 'dod ma su 'dod mi su nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra ltar mi thos par 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su pa sgribs so//

de nas byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdaganyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ phyogs gcig tu song nas ngus te mchem phyung nas 'di skad du bdag gi lus batsongs la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'aphags la bkur sti bya snyam n lus rtob yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni thob pa ngan pa thob bo zhes stsas so/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
kho brgyabyin gyis 'di snyam du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'adi lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag gi lus yongs su btang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sumatshogs/
pa ninam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtagatu ngu bdag gis sad par bya'o snyam du bsams so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze
khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sAwanas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste 'os nas byang chub sems dpalasems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces
smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar khyod yod mi dga' zhing gdung la mchi ma byung zhing gnas pa ci nyes de la rtagatu ngus 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u pa'i lus btsong bar 'dodon lus
'de nyo ba yang ma red do// brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugasacan gyis smras pa/ gosakyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod/ rtag tu dus de la sas pa/ bram ze'i khye'u nga ni chos
'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod cing 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya bar 'dod na/ lus khro ba de
ngas ma red nas de la nga 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang/ 'phagasapa byang chub sa mas
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag galus nyo ba yang ma red do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag

tu ngu la'adi skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu pa la mis ni bya ba mad kyi 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang/ rkang dag pa la dgos na de'i rin gyis nyor byin cig/
ces byas pa dang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'adi snyam du sems te/gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di bdag gi snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang nyob red pa
'di ni bdag gis red pa'i mchog legs pa ra red do// bdag gi lus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro sAmanA
de sems dga' ba dang se mas bde ba dang sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'adi la 'di skad byis smras so// bram ze'i khye'u pa'i lus 'di las khyed gang dang gang 'dod pa sbyin no//
des de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes byas pa dang/ des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de nga la byin
cig denas byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'a chen po rtag tu ngum tshon rnon po thogs nas lag pa g.yas pa phugase khrag gzags so/ bamagayas pa sha med par gtogs nas rus pa/
gcog tu rtsi ga pa'i drung du song ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu khrag mang po 'dzag pa dang/ bar
missing
bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dang 'a chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang rus pa dang rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu ngus de la smras pa bu
mo bram ze'i khye'u 'di la lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yeng bkur sti

pa/ khya'ong de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang
yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rigs sam yon tan gyi khyad par tsizhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des bu mo de la 'di skad ces bu mo rags kyi bu de ni gong
la ngas bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ de la ngas bslabs na bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
khar sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu yang thob pa ra'agyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang//

bod 'dom gang ba dang/ 'od gzer na tha' yas pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur/ so so ya nga dag
par rig pa ba'i rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo brgyad kyang rab tu thob nga ra'agyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ tshul khrimaMs rnam par dag pa
bas ma gyis mi khyab pa dang/ tI pa'i dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs nga 'i stobs bcu rab tu
klob par 'gyur/ bla na me da pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang na ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu bge bsha' bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin

po che yang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dang 'asams dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di sad ces rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgyu cha ngo

phul du byung ba 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtshar te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi don 'di lta bure re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang+ga'ikrung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su btang bar bya ba yin na mang po'i phyir
[p]// ltaci sos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'adi dag rgya che zhing phul du byung ba yongs su brjod pa ci lta bar bdag kyang 'dod cing bzed do// de ltan ya nga rigs kyi bu khyod gang dang gang
gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i gsar ram nor bu'am mu tig gam pa zurlu 'am/ dngul lam mu sa la gatra 'am la hi tar ga 'am shelam me tog
gam bdug pa 'am/ dri 'am phreng ba 'am byug pa 'am phye ma'am gos sam gdugs sam rgyal mtshan nam/ dril bu 'am ba dan nam mar me khyed la ci dgos pa de dang de khyod la sbyin gyis bdag nyid la
'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta

ste de lta bu'i chos de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid
kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i medun du 'dug nase'adi skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod de lta bu'i yi dam la brtan pa dang/ de lta bu'i chos don du gnyer ba 'di ni legs

so legs so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus dag gis kyang ston byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs -]

ka mkhas pa yongs su zhus pas chos rin po che shin tu thob nas bla na me da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu nga la snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang
rkang gis bya ba med kyi pod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mchog slongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la mchog ci lta bu zhig sbyin par bya zhes sas so// des de la smras pa/
brgya byin sang rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag la stsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di la ni nga'i nus pa yod pa ma yin te/ yang yul 'disangs rgyas bcon ldan 'dus/
rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ mchog gzhan songs shig/ rtag tu ngus sas pa/ bdag gis lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di 'a na lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyed brtson pa chung
bar gyis shig/ lha rnams kyi dbang po nga'i lus 'di la bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po bden nga gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldeg par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo mad pa mkhyen na bden
pa de dang 'don pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang/ de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de lasangs rgyas skya na thu dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag
bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi zil ba bzhin du gnas pa dang nad med pa dang gnod pa med par gyur te// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
bo brgya byin dang/ bdud sdig can yang sobs pa med par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
tshong dbon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/ bdag gi khyo gang na yod pa der 'dong ngo// bdag gis
phama'i drung nas nor blangs te/ 'di ltar chos 'dod pa'i phyir gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po chos
'bags de la yang bkurasAri bya ba khyod la sbyin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu nga tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang 'grogs nas de'i rang gi khyim gang na yod pa der deng
ste nanas sgo drung du bsdad do// donas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de rang gi khyim du phyin nas pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum gsar dang dngul dang rin po che dang nor bu dang/ gos

dang me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dang rol mo'i che byadasna tshogs dag bdag la stsol cig/ bdag kyang
khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo bu mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa'/
chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de yang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur zhing des bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rAd par 'gyur ro// de nas bu
mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces sas so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu zhes bya ba de suzhig de da lta gang na 'dug bu mos smras pa/ rigasakyi bu de da lta 'o
sel gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/
sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las tharapar bgyi bar 'tshal bas de chos 'tshol ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs 'anga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bgyi bar 'atshal na/ de'alus nyo ba 'ga' yang mared cing ma red pas
sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas mi dga' bar soms shing mchi ma phyung nas mchis pa dang/ des nga na lus 'tshong bar 'adod na lus nyob ma red do zhes bgyis pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang
pa/ @#// bobargya byini bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas sas ba/ rigs kyi bu khyodasdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bdebs mi dga' bar somasashing mchim phyung nas gnas pa ci nyes/
des del sas ba/ bdaganyid 'tsho bar 'dod na bdag gi de nyo ba yang ma rAdado bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugasakyi brgya byin gyis sbasal/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'atshong bar 'dod ces bgyis
pa dang/ rtag tu ngus smras pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpo'asems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur sti bya'o// nga'i
lha sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas 'diltaste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir re zhes bgyis pa dang bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi brgya byin gyisasas pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni nga mi 'dod de/

ba kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang dag dgosaso zhes bgyis pa dang/ rigs kyi bu des yi ma gsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de mtshon
rnon po thogs te bdag gi lag pa phu gnas khrag gzags brla shamadu par gtogs te/ rus pa gcogatu rtsig pa'i drung du song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste rus pa dang rkang sbyin no snyam nas rig
kyi bu de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thogan mchis pas mthong// de la bdag 'disAm du bgyid do// mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la bdag nyid na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/
de'i thad du bdag mchis nas 'di skad du bgyis so// bis kyi bu 'a daltar bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid kyi lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang dbadag la 'di skad ces
mchisI/ bu mo bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang snying dang rus pa dang rkang sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nganadabul te ngalanor gzhan ci yang mang dazhis mchi'o// bdag gis khyod la nor gyis
tsazhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang/ debadag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang nub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pochos 'aphagasal yang bkur stir bya'o zhes mchis nas/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi rosisam yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/
des bdag la 'di skadadu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'isangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
de las 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bdagal mchisI/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang mgu ba chen po sgyus nas 'di snyam du bgyid
de rigs kyi bu 'dipishin tu chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'di lta bur gangarang galus kyi bar du yang mi gnas par spro bani dka' ba brgyad pa ste ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag
nyid kyang yongs sugatong na/ bdag cag la 'angs srid gang dag mngazhing rgya che ba dag yodan/ ci'i phyir bdag cag chos la mchod pa mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dug/
zla la smon lam ci'i phyir ma gdab snyam nas rigs kyi bu dza' ba ngag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i srog 'phrog pa'i tshul gyi natsha dag ma byed
pash+tsa cig khyod donagang gis 'apags pa byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chan po ches 'phags la bkur stir bya ba dang/ bla mar bya ba'i nor mang po dag bdag gis pha ma las blangs te bdag
kyang khyod dang 'grogs te byang nubasams dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o// bdag gis kyang rigasakyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongs su
brjod pa 'dilta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa de lta bu'i chos dag bdag gis kyang rdzogs par bgyi'o zhes bgyis na/ yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen bo de bdag la sul ba gnang bar
mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigasakyi bu de dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pochos 'phags la mchod par bgyi'o//
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i
gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa 'gan thog ringagazhi gcig tu par bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sems can thams cud bder thob par byed pa'i/
bar ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu gang dgad dbang gi phyir dolta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas dag laso bar byed na khyod ngad kyis gnang gis/bu red kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub san sa dpa'

sams dpa bachen po tshos 'phagasakhalta bodaphyag ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang mchod pa byed du 'gro yis nged 'gro ba'i goskabs phye zhig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' n+d+ha sa/
dba' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba'i phyir chos te/ rang gi pha ma la rdeg par byas nas 'di skad ces yab yum ci skad gsungs pa de bzhin du mdzod cig dwangs pa'i
bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi yang bar chad mi bgyid do zhes smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa dang bkur stir bya ba'i phyi'i

chas par gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des ngashing rta lnga brgya yang rgyun gyis brgyan/ bu'o lta brgyade dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to// rgyan gyis nga rgyan nas me tog tha dad pa kha dog sna tshogs padab//

dang gos kha dogasnatshogs thogs bdug ba dang ding phreng ba dang byug pa dang ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag thegs/ rin po che snatshog sa rnam patha dadapa
ga dang po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dadapa'i rang bzhin gyi ma tog dag kyang thogs bza' ba dang bcal bdang myang ba mang de pha mas kyang thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dba'achen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rtagacig khulhan cig tu zhugs te/ bumo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas pham lasogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar

phyogs ga la bder legs su dong snyo mthar gyis song ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas/ grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba blta/
na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che snabadun gyi rang bzhin gyi rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim pa bdunadang shing la'i phrang ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su
bskor ba/ tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa 'bor cing rgyas pa bde ba le lags pa// mi dang sku be mang pos gang ba/ bar gyi tshong khang gi phreng ba ra mi sna tshogs su

bris pa lta bur blta na sdug pa/ yigs par gyur pa mnyam zhing ma tshungs pa skya bo dang khyogs kyi bzhan pa dang rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzor dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis legs par bsgrubs

pa grong khyer de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang 'khor stong phrag du ma dang 'khor brgya stong phrag su
yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nasachos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de 'di lta bu'i bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste dper na dge slong bsam gtanadang be rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par
zhugs pa bzhinano// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te bdagashing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang nubasams dang 'asems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du sbrugro ba ni bdag gis
mi cha'o snyam nas shing rta las babs so// de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang gzhan tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang mnyam du shing rta las babs so tshe/ abyang chubs/
nganga' sems dpachen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du dar te/ mchod pa'i bkod pa tshad med pa dang/ byang chub sems da nga 'a sems
dang 'chen po chos 'phags gal ba der dong ngo// yang de'i tshe byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang partsegs pa rin po
tshes bdun gyurang bzhin las byas pa tsan dan dmarange sa brgyan cing tog gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i gru bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te de
dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do// bgasos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir brtags te/ 'di lta sta shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir a ga ru nag po 'ba'
zhig gis bdug par byed do// khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus suminapo ches bdun las byas pa'i khribazhi btsugs te de'i steng du rin po tsho sgrim bzhi ba'a gnas de'inang du shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bo zurlu bzhubs bris pa bcug ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de yang dar gyi rkun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas 'phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems

dang bsen su dang 'chen po rtag tu nga tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa brtsegs pa de mchod pa 'i bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa na thong zhing de na lha stong phrag du ma dag/

kyang na thong ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog mnadA ra pa dang lha'i tsan dan gyi phyam dang lha'i gsar gyi phye ma dang lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor mngon par/

'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo// lha'isil snyan dag kyang thos so// mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad

ces snyas so// lha rnams kyi dbang po khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir lha'i me tog man dAr ba dang lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang lha'i gsar gyi pha ma dang

lha'i dngul gyi phyi ma dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor mngon par rab 'byor lha'i sil sAna'adi dag kyang lha rnams bar snang la ci'i phyire brdung/ de skad ces smras pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
byin gyis byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
yum yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di las bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su 'gro ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyurab yin na/ khyod ma shes sam de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtagatu ngus lha rnams
kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shika shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ bsgra/
byin gyis sa pa/ rigs kyi bu deni khang pa brtsogs pa 'di'i nang na gsar gyi glegs bam la bi 'ad+ma dang bas bris pa 'apags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dang rwa chen ngo res 'apags kyis
rgya rim pa bangon gyis rgyus btab nas bzhag ste nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rtag tung tshong dpon gyi bu me lasogs te/ bu mo lnga brgyadang

lhan cig tu de dag gi me tog dang phrengaba'i chun po dang gos rin po che dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang gsor
[z ]@#// dang dngul las byas pa'i mi rtog gang dag thogs 'ongs pa'i tshogs de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la mchod pa byas te/ 'di lta ste 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'/
sams dpa' chen po chos 'phags mchod pa'i phyir de dag las gzhan dang gzhan chesaso sor bzhag go/ de nas byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo/

ny+nya la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dag gis me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba drang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang/ tsan dan gyi phyi ma dang gsar
dang dngul las byas pa'i me tog dang lha'i rol mo rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mched pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der song/

phyin nas/ chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po chos 'phagasal ma tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal

mtshan dang phril bu dang padan dag dang tsan dan gyi phyi ma dang gser dang dngul las byas pa'i me tog dag gis gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to// lha'isil snyan dag kyang yang dag par rab
'udakrol lo// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i stang name tog gi khang pa brtsegs pazhig tu gyur to// gser dang dngul las byas pa'i ma rtog

[@]/dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i me tog de dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// de'i chos gos dang gos rin po che de dag kyang ngarasAngal rin poche sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra
bar 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags

kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho'aphrul de lta bu ma thongasU/ mthong nas denas de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di rdzu 'phrul che zhing

'di ltar ma thu che la 'di ltar gzi brjid che sta/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid na yang rdza 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dran blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub/
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mi ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chan po chos 'phags
la dga' ba skyed nas tshogs pa de dag thams cad dang lhag nga 'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs
pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nayang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen
@#// chen po chos 'ang gsakyis chos gang thobang du gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'bags shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la bkurastir byed pa dang pa mar byed pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa labakur sAr byed pa dang bla mar byed par sheg cig/ byang chub sems dpa' samasadapa' chen po chos 'phags rtsiltar

yang dag par ston ng bzhin du bdagacagakyang skye bo mang bo yang dgapar ston par gyur cig/ ciltar byang chub sems dpa' sams dang 'a chen po chos 'phags 'dishes rab kyi parol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas/

pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs makhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces skyasaso// de nas byang chung sems dang lasems

drapa' chen po rta gzhungu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyade dgagis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lamachod pa byas/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpe chen po chos 'phagasal yang bkur sti byas
te6 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkyang pa la mgo bo rnams kyis mngon du phyag 'tshal nasazhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te phyogasagacig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sam sadapa' sems dpa' chen portag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di na bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol zhing

ka 'brog dgon par phyin pan/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song zhig dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur zhes sgra thos te/ bdag gis sgra de las yang dag par bstan pa de thos nas shar phyog

gal ba de legasasu mchis naas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis sgra de la cisrid cig mchi bar bgyi su'i drung du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyanacing redapar 'gyur ba yang dag par 'grob sgra thos pa la

bdag gisam dris sosAms des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdungabar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan baduga'adus tade ltar shin tu gdungabasazas lasams ngan ma byung gi gzhan du nangashis rab kyi

parol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te ci srid cig tumachi bar bgyi ba dang shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa red par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa dang/ de nas bdagagi mdun du

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig byung sa de 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod 'dinas dpag tshad lnga brgyar rim gyis song dang grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'bags

shes rab kyi pha la tuphyin pa ston cing 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te de nas bdag dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po de nyid

kyis khyab par gyur nasas phyogs de nas mi bskyod par khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so// de bdag gis thos pa na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mngapo skyes par gyur to// bdag de na ma ning
na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbug dbyung ba mdzad pa legs so zhes bya ba byin te rigs kyi bu legs so legs so khyod kyi ting nge
'dzin 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'dilas gnas pas naged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
bdag la shin tu legs par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzengs bstod yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas mi snang bar gyur to// bdag kyang de nas ting 'dzind las lasanasa'adi
snyam du bsams tedubazhinagshegs pa de dag gang nas byon de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo// de nas yang bdag gis 'disnyam du byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phag

pachos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa mngon pangashes pa lnga dang ldan pa sngon gyi rgyal ba dgal bgyi ba bgyis pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa'i ng shin tu bslabs pa
yin te/ des bdag la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa'i don 'di ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro snyam bsams te/ bdag gis de bzhin

gshogs pa'i sku'i sgra thos pa las ci ltar gangams pa de ltar shar phyogs ga la ba der mchis te mchis nas kyang rgyang ring mo zhig nas bdag gis 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste mthong ma thagatubadagal

dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs brtsegacigapar yid la byed pa'i bde ba de lta bu skyes nga ra gyur to// rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas khyond bzhin
gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces 'drin/ rigs kyi bu ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa 'tshal cing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dngami 'bral bar 'gyurab r de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa'o//
de skad ces sas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'disad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de

de bzhin gshegs po de dag ni gong gnas kyang ma byon gang du yang m bzhud cing de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos to/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ma skye ba la 'ong ba'am
'gro ba med de mi skya ba gang yin pa de na ribazhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' lan 'ing ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de yang dag pa'i ma tha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//

rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba lam 'gro ba shes pa med de stong pa nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu rtsi lta ba bzhin la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba shes pa mad de/ ci lta ba bzhin/
gangayin pa de nid bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba 'a ni'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
gisakyi bu 'gog pa lana'ong baba'agro shes pa medade 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i khams ni'ong ba 'ama'agro ba shes pa mdade/ nam
zla mkha'i khams gangayin pade ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan na med de rigs kyi bu chos 'di dgag de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang chos zam

cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di dag ni de bzhin nyid gcigs rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la ni gnyis su byar med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig

ste 'di lta ste med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa 'o// rigs kyi bu'adi lta ste dper na skyes bus sos ka'i sgrub tham sos ka'i tsha ba nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe smig rgyu g.yo ba

mthong ba la 'dir chu btung ngo snyam nas de gang du chu mthong ba de dang der rgyugan rigs kyi bu de ci snyam dusams shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po 'am lho phyogs sam nub phyogs sam/ byang phyogs las chu de

yigang nas 'ongs chu de gang du song/ rtag tu ngus sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu stsoge rgyu la chu ma mchis na 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba shes pa lta ga la mchis de rigs kyi bu skyes bu de ni mas gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin
can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis sgrigargyu ba mthong nasachu ma mchis pa la chu 'du shes skyas kyi yang de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis mamachis so// chos 'phags kyis sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu de
de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu g.yaMsu dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs samasgrar mngon par chags pa de dgan de bzhinagshegs pa la byon pa 'am bzhud par rtog go/ gang de bzhin/

gshegs pa la byon pa'i m bzhud par rtog pa de dag thamasacad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chalapa'i rong bzhin can zhes bya ste dper na skyes bu de nyid chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no// de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos nyid kyi sku'o// rigasakyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mad de rigs kyi da bzhin du de bzhinagasheg

pa rnams la byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma byed pas sbal pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam rta'i tshogs sam shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba
'am 'gro ba modato// gos kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhinagshegs pa'i sku la yang byon pa'i m bzhudapa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta snya dper na skyes bu gnyid kyis leg pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs
ba gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi'am lnga'am drug gam bdunanas brgyad dam dgu 'am bu 'am nyi shu 'amasum cu ma bzhi bcu'am lnga bcu 'am brgya 'am stong ngam brgya stong ngam de las lhag
dpa zhig mthong lasasad pa dang/ des de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma klongan/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam dusams de bzhin gshegs pa dedag gang nas khyon/ de bzhin gsheg/
pa dedag gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu rmilam la chos gang yang yongs su grub pa shes pa gda'o// rmi lam ni brdzun te yang dag pa ma lags so// chos 'phagasakyis sbas pa/
ts+tsu rigs kyi bu de de bzhin tachos thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lam lta bu 'o zhes gsungs so// rig kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thang sacad rnalam lta bur yang dag par lta

babazhin du bstanapa ni ngashes pa de dag nid bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi sku dang gzugs kyi bskur mngon par zhen par byed de de ltar chos nyid ma shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par rtog

go ngagang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par rtog pa'i byis ba so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba 'gro ba drug po 'di dag thams cad du dongang 'dong pa 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag

thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang gang dag chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta

bu 'a de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu 'o zhes yang dag pa'i lta ba bzhin dubastan pa shes pa de dag ni chos gang la yang 'ong pa'i m 'gro ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par mi rtog go/ gang

dag chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba 'am skya babam 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid durab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de drag/

ningabazhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am bzhudapar mi rtogago/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid de lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar sbyod pa ste de
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni su la 'khor gyi bsod soms don yodapar tha ba ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so// rigs

kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lhanus ma yin nub nas ma yin byang nas ma yin phyogs mtshams nasaM na yin steng dang 'og nas

yin phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'os mod kyi 'on kyang sems can dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtenanas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che de dag 'byung ste de dgakyang rgyu mdu pa 'byung ba ma yin gyi rgyudang rkyen
dang gzhi la rag las pa yin te brten nas 'byung ngo// rin po che de dag 'gag pa ya phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang mi 'pho mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen de dag yod nonapo che dag rab tu 'byed d// skyon

de dag med na rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba yang mad par 'agyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku yongs su grub pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon phyogs bcu'i
[7 @#// 'jig rtenani gang du yang ma bzhud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku med pa yang ma yin te sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas rgyu la rag las pa rkyen la rag

las pa/ sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa las byung ba yin zhing de ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na yang yod pa ma yin no// 'on kyang rkyen rnams yod na sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te

rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par grub pa yang mi snang ngo// rigs kyi bu 'dilta ste dpar na/ pi wang gi sgra byung ba yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs 'gags pa yang gang du yang ma'igrogang na yang mi 'pho so/

rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la rten nas byung ba rgyu la rag las pa rkyen larag las pa 'di lta ste pi wang gi khog pa la brten nga gas pa la brten rgyud la brtan yu ba la brten/ 'ashing bu la brten rgyud rten la brten mo de

las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas 'di ltar pi wang de las sgra byung// rgyu la rag las pa rkyen la rag las pa'i sgra de yang pa wang gi khig pa lasam byung nga gas pa las ma byung rgyud las ma byung yu ba las

ma byung shing bu las ma byung rgyud rtenangs ma byung mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi 'on kyang de dag thams cad 'dus pa 'a sa kyang sgrarogadags so// sgra de 'ogags pa ya nga gang du'ang
mi 'gro'o// de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa yang rgyu la dga' sa pa/ rkyen la rag las pa dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sbyor ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin

te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin rkyen gcig gis ma yin dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sa rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa yang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/

de ni gang nas kyang ma byon to// rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du yang mi bzhud de rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshagos pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thamA
cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos thamasacad skya ba mad pa dang 'gag pa med par shes

pa de tshun chad khyod blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu nges par 'gyur zhinga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro// yang de bzhin gsheg

pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshos g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ltasachen po bco brgyad dang rnam pa drug tu g.yos
pa 'di lta ste/ 'gul rab tu 'gula kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu'akhrugs kun tu rab tu
'khrugs/ chem chem rab tu chemachem kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing sa bkong bar gyur to
[sl]/ @#// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang shing gel ba dang sman dang nagasatshalartsisnyad yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos/

za 'phags ga la ba de logs su rab chu'adud par gyur to// dus ma yin pa'i ma tog dag kyang stang gi bar snang las 'thor zhingame tog gi char chen po dag kyang thob po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang rgyal

ts+tshA po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rtogatu ngu dag gi phyogs su lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang lha'i ma rtog dag gis
'tsha 'thor mngon par 'thora mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad cesarigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang sems can gang 'jig tshog sal lta
zla babs la gnas pa lta ba dang bcas pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam bstan pa thos so zhes zer ro/ de nas byang chub sems
ba/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces sasaso// rigs kyi bu sa chen po g.yos pa 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang
'gas rkyen gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhinagshegs pa rnams mkhyen mi bzhud pa bstan pa 'di khyed kyis dris tshigs bdag

gis bstan pas srog chags stong phrag brgyad ma skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ gro ga
chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang rangs pa mchog tu

rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gang bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhudapa med pa'ibastan pa 'di dris pas sems can 'di snyid cig gi don byas
par gyur pa ni bdag gis rod pa mchog tu legs par red do// 'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par gyur pas
blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdag slar yang thetshom mi 'jug go/ bdag ni the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro
snyam pa dang/ de dga' ba dang rangs pa de dang ldan pas hAl bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas rtal bdun tsam nA'adugs/ 'di ltar bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags ba
mthong ste de'i sams sems kyis shesanas de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag byin// 'di skadangurigs kyi bu khyod kyis lha'i ma tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dang 'asams/
dang ' chen po chos 'phagasal bkur sti byed pas bkur snyir gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu'adi ni sa khyod yongs su gzung ba yin te/ gos kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas

te rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ci ltar khyod so bar byed pa de ltar ba skal pa gzhal du med grangs med par spro bar byed cing khur chen po byar bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni rud par dka'o
[@]zhes sa so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tungus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi drung nas me tog man da ra ba de dag blangs to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen bo chos 'phags la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad
ces rigs kyi bu deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang zhabs 'bring bgyi ba'i srid du bdagagis lus khyod 'a'abul lo zhes sas te/ des bdag gis lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sar sa
dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces rig
kyi ba bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyade dang lhan cig tu ma dang yongasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/

byang chub sems dang brnan sa'akhakur stir bgyi bla mar bgyi de dag dang nye bar gyur pa ra bgyi'ozhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs
pa bu mo lta brgya la 'di skad ces gsaso// bu mo dag gal te khyed nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed nang la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdaganyid byin cig dang de ltar na bu mo khyed ngas blang ngo bu
mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug ge khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci dang ci 'dod par bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo// de nas byang chub son/

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tus tshong dpon gyi bu med la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyananAtham cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bonos 'phags lam gro dang zhabs 'bring bya ba'i phyir phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni g.yog mo 'di dag 'bul zhing shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su 'angs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo// de
nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dang 'asams dang 'a chen po dag
@#// gsa'abyorab thams cad yongs subatangabar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'isams de lta bu s byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po gyur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

za/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dgalanod pa byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa nyan nus te rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan 'alta bu'i tshul dang 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par thug mkhas pa yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la

sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang shing rta lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tung
la sar byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' so/
dpa' chen po rtag tung 'di snyam du sems par gyur te 'di ltar ba dag chos 'adod pa'i phyire'ongos la 'jug pa'i m nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gi mo che la 'din mo legs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems

[a/]dba'achen po chos 'phags bdag gzung ba'i phyir 'di lta ste chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'grang ba dang 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis dusa'adab bar bya'o zhes soms par gyur to//denas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'aphags 'khodun gyi bar du ting 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag gzhal du med grangs mod/
pa dag dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang lo bdun gyi bar du gnyid dang rmugs pa

med par spyod lam rnam pa gnyis kyis dus 'du' bar byed de lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung gnod sems kyi rtog pa mabyung rnam par 'tsho ba'i rtog bag cu kho la brkus pa ma yin sems kyi ma
par rtog pa ma byung ste/ gzhan dun byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting 'dzin lasanam ldang bar 'gyur bdag cag gis kyang khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nasachos ston
par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri bshams nas bdag gis sa phyogs 'dichag chag ma btab kyis sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' samA

dang 'a chen po tshos 'phagasanga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyurab der legs par byug par bya me tog snatshogs mngon par dgram mo snyam mo// tshong dpon gyi bu
[s]@#/ la sogs pa bumo lnga brgya bo de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjesasu slob cing spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes

su'ajug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngusalha'i sgra dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags daste bzhagabadun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste langs

nasagrong khyer gyi dbus su'adug sa chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang dga' mgu yi rangs 'batu dga' mgu zhing bde

paNaM ba dang bde bde ba skyes te/ tshong dbon gyi ba mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin bshams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang

gi bla gos dus las phung de bla gos lnga brgya po de dag stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo// de ltar byang chub sems dang 'a
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan bshams pa la bu mo de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'/

sems dpa' chan po rtag tu ngu sa phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na ci nas kyang bdud sdig can gyi byang chub sems dpa3sams dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de chu ma rnyed nas sems mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal

00ti/ yid mi bde bar gyur cing sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang gang gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang mchod pa de yang mimadzes par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sa phyogs der rgyag nag 'debs pa'i chu de dag//

thams cad kyang mi snangab nyid du byas pas kun tu chu btsalan nu ma red de// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa'i chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du ma la bdag gi lus phyagal khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chog/
chag gdub bo// de ci'i phyir zhon/ sa phyogs 'din rdul che ste/ sa phyogs 'dinas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na ma rung gas

bdag gi lus gdon ma khro ba 'jig pa'i chos can 'dis ci zhig bya bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhag pa bla'i nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor

zhing bdag gi lus stong phrag mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni 'di lta bu'i gnas samachos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ni ma yin te 'dod pa de lta bu'i chos can la zhig pa yin no snyam du bsams so// da
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tungus deltar ba samasanas mtshon rnon po blangs te bdag gces kun tu yug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de thams cad du chag chag btab bo//

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya bo de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blad te rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi/
[ri ]khrag gis sa phyog dedag thamasacad du chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdigacan des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i grags gang du red par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa'

samasadapa'i chemorta gzhung dbu mo dedagathamasacad sems gzhan du gyur pa med do// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byig 'disAmadusams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu bu'aditsimaduchos

dod pa dang citsam duyidamal brtan pa dang ritsamadu go cha chen pobagos pa dang/ lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams lamilta bdang/ thanamadapa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i phyire' lta ste// blun

mdang yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang nuba mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su dung ga gtumed pa las sems can thams cad tharapar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsamapa la yang dag par

zhugs paning mtshar sam mo// donas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan danagyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsanangan gyi chu de'i drodim pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dbaldan

pa de'adris sa phyogasad khor khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga rgya tshang bar dris yongs su khyab bo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chusems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rta gzhungul 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu'i ga

solegasaso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa leg so leg so// khyod kyisachos 'dod pa dang chos yongs sutsholab yang leg te/ rig kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomapa yang dag

[4/]par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di budangabartson 'grusa'adi lta bu dang chos 'dod pa 'di lta bu s bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so zhes smras so// de nas

byang chub sems dang bsam dang 'chen po rtag tu ngu'adisnyam dusems te/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po chos 'aphags kyi chos kyistananibating/ sa phyogs 'di phyag bdar ni legeparabyas chag
chagane ligaparab taban bdag gis me togagang dgagis sa phyogasa'adir legs par gtor bar bya bdang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chadacing chos kyi stan la 'dug pas gtor

bar byaba'i me tog de dag gang nas redapar 'gyur sumo// gnas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rta gzhung la 'diskacesagakyi bu lha'i mi rtog man da ra ba 'di dag lang la

khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tumatogabakram par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pochos 'phaguchos ston cing chos kyi khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cigaces smras nas des de la lha'am togaman/

dar ba cu'i khal stong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dang 'chen po rtag tu dus ma tog de dag blangs te me tog khacig gis sa phyogs deme tog bkram par byas so// ma tog kha cig gisani byang chub
sems dpa'sumasadapa' chen po chos 'phags lagator to// de nas zung zhubasems dapa'i sems dapa'i nyalochos 'phags bdun 'das pa dang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te chos kyistan gang na yod pa der
spya// 'ongasanas stanabating ba la'adugaste/'khor brgya stong phrag dums yongs su bskor cing bdunagyisabaltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/

chen portagatus byang chub samasadapa'i sems dpa' chen po chos 'phagun thong ma thag tu'adi lta ste dpar nabasam gtanadang po la snyoms pa razhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid 'byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob
bo de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pason pa nib yin te/ 'diwA si chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin r mnyam pa nyid

pa ngo 4chos thams cad dbanapa'i dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngan pa nyidado// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi parol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlomasamasamad pa

nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyidaro// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa mod pa nyid do// chos tham cad regacig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin parogacig pa nyid do// chos tham cad mu med pa nyid nga sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos tham cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pasbyaba medang nyid do//chos thamacad

[l]'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa'i gag pa med pa nyid do//nama mkhan med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyonapa mumadapa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shis rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa

mumed pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshog pa nyidapas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pasnyatshog pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyidang sa shes rab kyi lo'atu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do//gzug mumed pa nyipas shes rab kyi pha/

khol tu phyin pamu mad pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shesad 'du byed n+nams dang rnam pa ra shesar mu med pa nyidapas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mumed pa nyid do// sa'i khamasamumad pa nyid pas shes rab kyi ba/

rol tu phyin pa mumad pa nyid do// de bzhin du nu'i khams dang ma'i khams dang rlung gi khamanyamumadapa nyid pas shes rab kyi parolatu phyin pa mun dang nyidad// nam mkha'ikhams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rolatu

phyin pa mumad pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa nyidapas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pasumad pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi nga rol tu phyin pa mnyamapa nyid do// chos thamacad m

'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi sa khol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos thams cad dmigasu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pe rol tu phyin pa dmigasumed pa nyid do// chos zamacad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyidang sa/

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos tham cad byed pamed pa nyidapa sangashes rab kyi rol tu phyin pakhyedapamed pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes khyab yin no// de nas byang chub samasarapasems dpa' chen po rta gzhung de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tsho chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid cesakhya
@#// ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ches thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos
thamasacad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting pa'i dzin dang/ chos thams cad regacig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang//
tshos thams cad mu med pa zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cud 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/
nam mkha' mu mad pa zhes bya ba'i ting pa'i dzin dpa/ rgya mtshomu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga'adzin dang/ ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha' rtog pa med pa
zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzugs mu mad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin dang/ sasikhams ma chad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin du nu'i khams dang ma'i khams dang rlung gi khams mumad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam
mkha'i khams mu mad pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ches thamA
[Fiz/]cad m 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting pa'
dang/ chos thams rud byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rtag tu ngus de lta bu la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu rab tu thob par gyur to// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phag
kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o/ ba/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar

phyogs dang lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang mtshams dang 'og dang stong gi phyogs dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klungagi bye
masnyad dgun/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye masAd dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang nub soms dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas ste tshul

'di lta bu nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo// 'di lta ste dper nad ltar ng stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasaM
'di na chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasasubaskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun dubyas ta/ tshul 'di nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di nyid/
kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'achad pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyisam khyab pa dang thos pa rgya mtsho dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du yang nam yang
[% ]sangs rgyas dang bral bar ma gyur to// skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skyes// than rma laman yang sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro des mi khom pa thams cad ni sos dal ba phun sum tshogs pani bsgrubs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pal ye shes sgrub pa yin par
rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po thamasaM cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa 'di la spyad par
bya'o 4 shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyen par bya gzung bar bya bcang bar bya bklag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya/ bstan par bya nye bar bstan par bya lung 'bogs par bya
ba kha ton du bya bri bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis glegs bam chen po yi ge gsal zhing rab tugasal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang

byug pa dang phye ma dang rol mo dang na bza' dang/ gdugs dang rgyalamtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bya bla mar bya rjed par
byam chod par bya ri mor bu bsnyen bkur bya ste/ kun dga' 'di no pe'i rjes su bstan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di ji snyem du sams/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi
ston pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang/ ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang/ yid kyi las byams pa yid du

'ong bas rim gror byas te de lta bsan kun dga' bo// de ltar nga bzhugs ta'atsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la ci ltar khyod kyis dga' ba dang dang ba dang ra mor byas pa kun dga' bo de ltar ng 'dus nas shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' bo tsi nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar ma 'gyur bar kun//
dga' bo khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du longs su gtad do// rjes sulangs su gtad do/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ni srid du rab tu spyod pa de srid
du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhani ga shegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dpalachang ba dang/ klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang/ ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang/ yi ge
'dri ba dang me tog dang/ bdug pa dang dri dang/ phreng ba dang byug pa dang phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ dril bu dang/ ba dan dag dang/
khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang/ mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed bla mar byed/ rjed nga ra byed mchod par byed/ ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed pa 'asi mas can du
dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na slong par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs/
pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang/ driwar bcas
pa'i 'jig rtenayi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste
sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o///bcom ldan 'adas ma'aphags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkyason
darAnasid+d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lotsA ba ban de d+harma tAng kAl la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab/ slad kyis dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod kyi dpal lha btsan po bkra shisalha sde
btsan gyibikas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan bsub+hAShita dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos 'grel pa dang mthun par bsgyur/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Dita chen po dI paM
[@]// paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra dzAn dang/ le ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas gnyis kyis brgyad stong pa bshad ba'i dus su che 'a zhig gtan la phab/ phyis
zar sgreng gi gtsug lag khangadu letsub 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis rgyu gar gyi mdogasum la gtugasanas lan gnyis gtan la phab/ slad kyis yang le tshub de nyidakyis bshad
thub mdzad cing phran tshog sakyang gtaMnal phab/ dus phyis lotsub chen bo shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe dang yul dbusakyi dpa du ma bsagasaM nas gtan la phab/
slayang snyigs dusakyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po// zha lu lo tsa ba dpal rin chen chos skyong bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis/ rgya bod kyi dpa du ma dang bstan nus shin tu rnam
par dag par mdzad pa'i ma phyi dang/ rgyudapa gnyis dang/ bod dpa bar ma rnams la gdugasate de shAkya'i dag slong mnga' ris rab 'byams pa dpal 'byor rgyal mtshan dang/
skadaganyis skya ba'i btsun pa kun dga' chos bzang gnyis kyis/ rnam 'gyur lcags pho stag lo'i chu'i zla ba'i tsan+d+ratshesakyi dkyila 'khor yongs sugang ba'i nyin/ yar stod
sham+bastabade 'byung gi khengarichen posamadzes ba'i yulagyi thig le yang par zhus shing dag par byas pa'o//
